events.message: I recently received my order but unfortunately I want to request a refund because the item was not what I expected and I would like to know how to proceed.
The customer's message indicates a refund request; thus, the case is categorized under Refund for further handling.
Assigning this refund request to the customer support agent specialized in returns and refunds.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
Could you please provide your order number so I can verify the purchase and start processing your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I hope this helps you locate my order and proceed with the refund promptly.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process for your order 123456789. You should see the amount credited back in 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for your quick response and help. I appreciate the refund being processed so fast.
Your refund request has been successfully processed. Please contact us if you have any further questions.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and everything is in order. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Closing the case as the refund has been confirmed received and no further actions are pending.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey to hear about your experience with our customer support.
